title: Felid (monster)
data:
{{version030}}
''This page is about the monster. For the player species, see [[Felid]].''
{{monster info|felid}}

==Useful Info==
'''Felids''' are fairly ordinary monsters. Like many other monsters themed on player species, they only appear in certain [[vault]]s, or as [[shapeshifter (monster)|shapeshifters]].

[[Natasha]] is a felid unique.

==Tips & Tricks==
None needed.

==History==
*Felid monsters were added in [[0.8]], along with the player species.
